traits.name: armorProficiencyHeavy
traits.desc: Can wear heavy armor without additional penalities. Strength requirements still apply.

traits.name: armorProficiencyMedium
traits.desc: Can wear medium armor without additional penalities. Strenght requirements still apply.

traits.name: armorProficiencyLight
traits.desc: Can wear light armor without additional penalities. Strngth requirements still apply.

traits.name: improvedCritical1
traits.desc: Critical attacks deal x3 damage (normal is x2).
